about: I am a passionate software engineer focused on building cutting-edge frontend applications. I love exploring new technologies like WebGPU, WASM, and browser-side AI.

experience.description: Leading the development of a real-time collaboration platform using React and WebSockets. Optimized performance by 40%.
Built responsive web applications for various clients using Vue.js and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Local AI Chat
projects.description: A fully client-side chatbot using Transformers.js and RAG. Runs entirely in the browser with no backend.

projects.name: Visualizer Web
projects.description: A high-performance data visualization tool built with D3.js and Canvas API.
